execution_quality: Agent made no substantive contribution; the brief turn ended without meaningful output or test execution.
work_category: Testing iteration with minimal work requested; user redirects approach after initial test attempt.
summary: Brief testing task that ended without actionable results. User found the test ineffective and redirected to test notification send functionality instead, indicating the initial approach was misaligned.
follow_up_pattern: User suggests alternative testing approach (testing notification send first) rather than the initial test plan
